mapper.select: select id,nickname,email,avatar,web_site,intro from blog_user_info where id=(select user_info_id from sys_user where user_id=#{loginId})

select ui.*,u.user_info_id,u.ip_source as address,u.last_login_time as lastLoginTime,u.create_time as registerTime from sys_user u left join blog_user_info ui on u.user_info_id = ui.id where u.user_id=#{userId}
